Matrix Name: Curtain Wall Facade System Progress L1

Name: L1
Pre-Install - 1. Check Cast-In is acceptable
Pre-Install - 2. Check Structure opening pockets/soffit correct
Tag 2: 2. check structure opening pockets and soffit is correct and within design tolerance

Name: Pre-Install - 3. Brackets torqued/Check T bolts & Nuts tightened
Tag 2: 3. brackets are torqued (photos), check the t bolts and nuts are tightened.

Name: Pre-Install - 4. Check bracket installed as per design
Tag 2: 4. check bracket installed as per design (bracket fixed to panel), if applicable, preferred to be checked by second person

Name: Pre-Install - 5. Gutter plate & sleeve installed
Pre-Install - 6. Check panels correct size/type for planning
Tag 2: 6. check panels are correct size/type for the planning to be installed location. all nessecary items are in place.

Name: Pre-Install - 7. Engage panel Sleeve across panel joint
Tag 1: 7. engage panel sleeve across panel joint

Name: Pre-Install - 8. Check façade pane in good condition
Tag 2: 8. check façade pane is in good condition (photos), no damaged or defected. any defect finding should be recorded. document the rectification plan either repair or replace.

Name: Pre-Install - 9. Glass cleaned ready for install
Pre-Install - 10. Apply Safety glass stamp where required but missed
Tag 2: 10. apply the safety glass stamp where is required but missed.

Name: Install - 1. Panel in good caulking condition
Install - 2. Protection tape in good condition
Install - 3. No defects/scratch/dents/distortion/crack
Install - 4. Panel installed & fixed in position as specified
Tag 1: 4. panel installed and fixed in position as specified. panels installed within tolerance (+/-1.5mm in plan, +/-1.5mm in elevation)

Name: Install - 5. Ensure bracket to panel hook locking screw installed
Tag 1: 5. ensure bracket to panel hook locking screw installed (ss screw)

Name: Install - 6. All Gaskets installed & caulked neatly
Tag 2: 6. all gaskets are installed and caulked neatly.

Name: Install - 7. Gaps between concrete slab edge & façade panel insulation
Tag 2: 7. gaps between concrete slab edge and façade panel insulation filled.

Name: Install - 8. Smoke flashing installed & sealed as per design
Tag 2: 8. smoke flashing installed and sealed as per design. overlap of sheeting and corretly caulked as per specifications

Name: Install - 9. Check Panel & Expressed fin aligning properly at base
Tag 1: 9. check panel and expressed fin is aligning properly at the base of the façade.

Name: Install - 10. Record panel ID on the floor plans/elevation
Tag 2: 10. record panel id on the floor plans or elevation

Name: Post-Install - 1. Remove external protection & for gasket caulk only
Tag 1: 1. remove external protection and for gasket caulk only

Name: Post-Install - 2. Check curtain wall in good condition
Tag 1: 2. check the curtain wall is in good condition. address any defect issues and findings

Name: Post-Install - 3. Scratch/Damaged powdercoating surface repaired
Tag 1: 3. scratch or damaged powdercoating surface are repaired.

Name: Post-Install - 4. Record defect panel on inspection report
Tag 1: 4. record defect panel on inspection report including panel id. mark the defect panel on the back of the panel

Name: Post-Install - 5. Record un-installed panel & any uninstalled item
Tag 1: 5. record un-installed panel and any un-installed item on the report. clearly markup the items and ownership of left over items and place them into the safe place for future use.

Name: Post-Install - 6. Conduct Water test to stackhead (leave for 24hrs)
Tag 2: 6. conduct water test to stackhead (leave for 24hrs) as per inhabit required testing or minimum testing requirments

Name: Post-Install - 7. Installer (Keystone) Sign off
Post-Install - 8. Lingyun QC Sign off
Post-Install - 9. Site supervisor Sign off
